                      EtCrisisType aType,
                      EtCrisisStatus aStatus,
                      DtGPSLocation aLocation,
                      DtDateAndTime aInstant,
                      DtComment aComment)
        Initialises the crisis.
        Parameters:
        aId - the id of the crisis
        aType - the type of the crisis
        aStatus - the status of the crisis
        aLocation - the location of the accident associated with the crisis
        aInstant - the date and time of the accident associated with the crisis
        aComment - the comment of the crisis
        Returns:
        the success of the initialisation

      • handlingDelayPassed

        public PtBoolean handlingDelayPassed()
                              throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                     java.rmi.NotBoundException
        If this crisis is still in the pending status and the system time minus the last reminder time is greater than the standard crisis reminder period then we return true.
        Returns:
        If the time since last handled is greater than the standard reminder period, return true
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if the server is offline
        java.rmi.NotBoundException - Thrown if the server is not bound

      • maxHandlingDelayPassed

        public PtBoolean maxHandlingDelayPassed()
                                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                        java.rmi.NotBoundException
        If this crisis is still in the pending status and the system time minus the last reminder time is greater than the max standard crisis reminder period then we return true.
        Returns:
        If the time since last handled is greater than the max standard reminder period, return true
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if the server is offline
        java.rmi.NotBoundException - Thrown if the server is not bound
